title: Unsupervised Test-Time Adaptation for Hepatic Steatosis Grading Using Ultrasound B-Mode Images
details: P Vianna, P Mehrbod, M Chaudhary, M Eickenberg… - IEEE Transactions on …, 2025
abstract: Ultrasound is considered a key modality for the clinical assessment of hepatic steatosis (ie, fatty liver) due to its non-invasiveness and availability. Deep learning methods have attracted considerable interest in this field, as they are capable of …
